reviews.review: Danielle is literally such an awesome human being. Super understanding, super sweet, and so good at making class fun and engaging and welcoming for everyone!
Pretty easy class, don't let it discourage you from being an AMP! Danielle is really nice and sweet as well :)

Free A+ guaranteed. Take this class with this professor, she is really nice and accommodating. There are some mandatory zoom meetings, but she was really nice and let me have makeup assignments. Other than mandatory assignments, there are weekly reflections that are free A's as long as you put in minimal effort.
Free A+. Super easy class and really nice teacher.
Best class I have ever taken
